column4: i am not able to download the keys for ppa , and i think the gateway has blocked it .. is there a way around .. tried different servers but doesn't work
any help?

Why would your gateway block SOME addresses?
Where are you trying to download the keys from?
Is this the first time trying? Did it used to work>
m trying it since past 4/5 days .
And what does it say? "Connection Timed Out"?
error is gpgkeys: HTTP fetch error 7: couldn't connect to host
anything ?
Can you please give me the PPA in question
tried lots of them docky2-stable, elementaryart/ppa , chromium-saily
Could you provide a full link please? I'm not in ubuntu right now, no access to apt
the ppa are working fine, its the gateway that's blocking from downloading keys (i think) so i wanted to know a work around
I wish to know one of the PPA direct address I was going to try to download a key here and then forward it to you.
Trying to see if I can get something..
sure.. thanks for trying
Can you access http://keyserver.ubuntu.com/
Then it should not have timed out x.x
didnt get you
So the command "sudo add-apt-repository ppa:elementaryart/ppa" times out?
